website_summaries.verdict: The Adidas Icon Bounce baseball cleat is one for stability and a comfortable ride on the baseball field. For its budget-friendly price range, these cleats bring a premium experience on the diamond. Although some found the shoe to be a bit tight-fitting, the pair makes up for it through its cushioned and stable feel.
pros: The Adidas Icon Bounce baseball cleat is comfortable, the majority of its reviewers say
A handful of shoppers love the overall style of these baseball cleats
A couple of reviewers disclosed that the price is great considering what the shoe can offer
Another customer says that the cleat is lightweight just like the Adizero Afterburner V
This Adidas baseball cleat belongs to a budget-friendly price range
cons: A customer experienced a durability issue with this baseball cleat
Several reviewers say that the shoe is a bit narrow

customer_reviews.title: Great looking spikes.
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves these, I recommend buying sport insoles though.
customer_reviews.author: Megahertz

customer_reviews.title: Major blisters
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what it was about these cleats, but they were the first pair of Adidas cleats my son has ever tried. He usually wears Nike, but he wanted some to match his uniform, so he went with these. The fit seemed fine, but he was getting massive blood blisters on his toes and heels to the point that we literally gave them away after about 4 tournaments (thinking maybe they just needed to be broken in) and bought some Nikes. They look sharp, but they really hurt his feet. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cleats!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these cleats. He said it is very comfortable and easily broken in.
customer_reviews.author: J. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Nice pair.
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of cleats. First timer and experience was great. Felt very grounded while sprinting around the bases.
customer_reviews.author: Mord

customer_reviews.title: Spoke broke off after wearing only a few times
customer_reviews.text: After wearing these only a handful of times (purchased in January before season started, played a couple tournaments in February before baseball shut down for pandemic) one of the metal spikes snapped off making the shoes useless. Return window is now closed and I don’t have a way to return it contact someone for help with this.
customer_reviews.author: ac

customer_reviews.title: Run true to size
customer_reviews.text: Great cleats! Fit true to size and a comfortable fit!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: The leather like material should hold up better than the mesh material that was purchased in the past. Time will tell
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them, they look great match his school colors... so far so good
customer_reviews.author: that guy69

customer_reviews.title: Careful with size
customer_reviews.text: By design, fits narrow feet. If you have a wide foot, might want to try sizes before ordering. But, great spike positioning for quick movement
customer_reviews.author: vs22

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest
customer_reviews.text: These fell apart and my husband said they ran a bit small.
customer_reviews.author: Tiana Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but quite heavy.
customer_reviews.text: These cleats looked very nice in appearance but were very heavy. They were returned for Adidas Afterburner model- which my son loves.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Mom of baseball player
customer_reviews.text: The hoes came fast, we’re exactly as described and fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of Cleats
customer_reviews.text: They are great very pleased with them might get another pair
customer_reviews.author: Issac

customer_reviews.title: Size is spot on
customer_reviews.text: Second pair of cleats he outgrew the first which are still like new after 1 year. Son says they are like wearing tennis shoes and very comfortable. Great price and great cleats buy them you’ll be glad you did. And came earlier than expected
customer_reviews.author: James griebe

customer_reviews.title: Really nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: Really nice quality and felt grate running on the field.
customer_reviews.author: RicardoCastillo

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Good product 2nd year ordering same cletes good quality preform wwll
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Value and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value and very comfortable. Initially bought as just an extra pair for my son they have replaced the more expensive ones. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor

customer_reviews.title: Great value!  Can by 2-3 pair for one pair of New Balance.
customer_reviews.text: Great cleats for the price. I like the reinforced toe.
customer_reviews.author: Brian H.

customer_reviews.title: Light shoe very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My son luv the shoe and also said their comfortable
customer_reviews.author: david s moore

customer_reviews.title: great for its price.
customer_reviews.text: I play ball on a daily basis and its comfortable and fits well . A great clitz... If not the greatest for its price.
customer_reviews.author: Or Elias

customer_reviews.title: Will be using this site again.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the style of the product.. Product was for my son's baseball tryouts.
customer_reviews.author: Clarence Prothro

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: True to size and fast shipping . My boys love them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get 'em!!
customer_reviews.text: These are very fresh for the money. Totally a good buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Campbell

customer_reviews.title: run small
customer_reviews.text: son wears a size 6.5 and the 7.5 is still to small
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: adidas Icon Bounce Cleat - Men's Baseball
product_meta.description: Comfort, support, and durability on the diamond. Get it all from the adidas Icon Bounce Cleat that offers a premium nubuck upper for support, bounce midsole for responsive cushioning, and a stealtrax outsole for traction on grass or dirt.
feature_bullets: Bounce cushioning provides enhanced comfort and flexibility
Nubuck upper with perforated vamp for breathability
Ironskin toe cap provides superior abrasion resistance in key toe-drag area
Padded tongue reduces lace pressure; Tongue wings for a locked-down midfoot fit
Stealtrax outsole plate designed for softball-specific movements and enhanced traction while playing any position on the field
